trim on both upper sides half_double_crochet chain 2 skip 1 double_crochet across till the and on the bottom side single_crochet across then we make the last row in every chain-2 space 1 in the bottom side half_double_crochet chain 2 skip 1 double_crochet across till the end of the row fasten_off finishing for bottom strap chain cca 120 cm long and then one row single_crochet in each chain across weave in loose ends and the bottom strap thread through the bottom chain-2 spaces pants rio form for back chain 15 single_crochet in third chain from the hook and single_crochet in each st across increase on both sides we increase in the 2nd row then 4 x in every 4th row and then always in the every 2nd row till the back is for size 36/38 cca 21 -22 cm long and cca 27 -28 cm wide and for size 40/42 cca 24-25 cm long and 30 32 cm wide then we make last row half_double_crochet chain 2 skip 1 single_crochet across and then fasten_off then we continue with the front join the yarn with slip_stitch right side facing at the beginning of the back and crochet across 14 single_crochet and crochet 7 cm without increases then make increases on both sides in every 2nd row 18 times till the front is for size 36/38 cca 21 cm long and cca 20-22 cm wide for size 40/42 23-24 cm long and 23 - 25 cm wide if we want to have the slips bigger we simply add some row more to the front and the back
